data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Herczek, Aleksander, Popov, Yuri A. (2015): An unusual new species of Hallodapomimus Herczek, 2000 from the Eocene Baltic amber (Hemiptera, Heteroptera, Miridae, Phylinae). ZooKeys 489: 25-32, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.489.8886, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.489.8886
